subject: Re: update website
preview: Hi Heath,  I had a customer calling he told me he placed an order for tomorrow, I checked it had gone into spam will this be just for the first time  Kind Regards  Rosanna    Machiavelli Ristorante It

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

I had a customer calling he told me he placed an order for tomorrow, I checked it had gone into spam will this be just for the first time

Kind Regards

Rosanna



Machiavelli Ristorante Italiano

123 Clarence Street
Sydney NSW 2000
Ph. 61 2 9299 3748
Fax. 61 2 9262 1490
Email. info@machiavelli.com.au

http://www.machiavelli.com.au/

Machiavelli is open Monday to Friday, lunch and dinner and Saturday dinner.

Closed Sundays and public holidays.

Hi Rosanna, 

Ok great can you please add heath@wolfiq.com.au as a full admin user on your Stripe account.

Here's a 1 min video showing you how to do this:
https://www.loom.com/share/dfbbc420ebb84cf1b8f727d822cc3f95

Hi Heath
The website still says it's closed, can we remove this message please

Kind Regards
Rosanna

Hi Heath,

Can you update the front page with the online and take away ordering please

Kind Regards

Rosanna



Machiavelli Ristorante Italiano

123 Clarence Street
Sydney NSW 2000
Ph. 61 2 9299 3748
Fax. 61 2 9262 1490
Email. info@machiavelli.com.au

http://www.machiavelli.com.au/

Machiavelli is open Monday to Friday, lunch and dinner and Saturday dinner.

Closed Sundays and public holidays.

Hi Heath,

I do have a stripe account, what do you need log in details

Kind Regards

Rosanna



Machiavelli Ristorante Italiano

123 Clarence Street
Sydney NSW 2000
Ph. 61 2 9299 3748
Fax. 61 2 9262 1490
Email. info@machiavelli.com.au

http://www.machiavelli.com.au/

Machiavelli is open Monday to Friday, lunch and dinner and Saturday dinner.

Closed Sundays and public holidays.

Hi Rosanna, 

We have added the pickup and delivery options now.

Regarding the credit card details, these need to go directly into a 'bank feed'. It's not legal for us to collect them on your site. 

Do you have a Stripe account (or similar) that we can have the customer pay directly into? If not, perhaps you can take their details over the phone once they have submitted their order?

Hi Joel,

Can we add to this option pick or delivery if it is delivery they will need to fill out address information as well as complete payment credit card details card number and expiry date

Kind Regards

Rosanna



Machiavelli Ristorante Italiano

123 Clarence Street
Sydney NSW 2000
Ph. 61 2 9299 3748
Fax. 61 2 9262 1490
Email. info@machiavelli.com.au

http://www.machiavelli.com.au/

Machiavelli is open Monday to Friday, lunch and dinner and Saturday dinner.

Closed Sundays and public holidays.

Hi Rosanna,

We have created a page and a form. The Form submission will be sent to "info@machiavelli.com.au". 
Let me know if this works for you? 
https://www.machiavelli.com.au/take-away-and-delivery/
@joel I already enabled the Home-Order sliders. Could you please help me do the rest? Thanks!

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath and Rica,

We have decided to open for take away and delivery as of tomorrow, at this stage we don't want to open the hungry hungry online order because we are starting with only a small menu, which I have attached.

Last year during the lockdown you added an order on line email notification and I would like to do the same now.

Please suggest how to best have this menu on our site so it is nice and visible and easy to order, we would need to note orders over $100 will have a free delivery or we will charge $15.

Look forward in hearing from you soon

Kind Regards

Rosanna



Machiavelli Ristorante Italiano

123 Clarence Street
Sydney NSW 2000
Ph. 61 2 9299 3748
Fax. 61 2 9262 1490
Email. info@machiavelli.com.au

http://www.machiavelli.com.au/

Machiavelli is open Monday to Friday, lunch and dinner and Saturday dinner.

Closed Sundays and public holidays.

Hi Rosanna, 

Hope all is well. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: https://www.machiavelli.com.au/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia
